angstd.ui.views.view
Class ViewInfo

java.lang.Object
  angstd.ui.views.view.ViewInfo

public class ViewInfo
extends java.lang.Object

Class containing all needed information to create a new view or tool. The information are gathered by reading a xml-formatted property file using the ViewReader within AngstdViewFactory.

This class makes attributes like the unique view id, its name, various icons and additional information available for a view.

For instance to check if a view is also a tool the view infos isTool() method would be used.

Author:
Andreas Held
